channel.title: Client help!
channel.description: Okay, I downloaded a client and a source and i want to know how to change the clients "default no-ip" if you know what i mean. I want it to load up on "myscape.no-ip.biz" instead of "OldUsersScape.no-ip.biz" if you get what im saying... how would i change this.

item.title: Client help!
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“RDogSilly, post:5, topic:388206”][quote author=patargangstar link=topic=484025.msg3546006#msg3546006 date=1301190150]
If theres a gui.java the ip would be in there if not look in client.java for

change the ip thats in the quotes, it will probably be 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0
then theres also 1 more you need to change
Search for

and change the ip there too,
then compile and run!
[/quote]

Change the ip in the quotes to My computers ip or my noip[/quote]
Your no-ip.

Read full topic
